about_the_game:
The Family Time DLC is all about celebrating what makes the Valley so special – family ties, creativity, and cozy moments.

Dive into fresh stories and build a stronger bond with your farm and family! 

What's New?

  • Grandparents’ House is now open: it’s time for a bigger project after decorating your treehouse. Grandma and grandpa loved what you did to your hideout, and now it’s time to cozy up their place! 

  • New Story Quests: new heartwarming adventures and challenges.

  • New NPCs – Mom and Dad: Your parents have come to the Valley, bringing lots of new farm adventures! 

  • New Animals: Rabbits, birds, insects and new species of ducks.

  • New plants and furniture: 10 new plant types (trees, vegetables, flowers, shrubs), and over 20 pieces of new furniture pieces to decorate with! 

  • New Mini-Games: five new activities to participate in! 

  • Planting Update: You can now place plants outside garden beds for decorative touches.

Ready to spend quality time with family and make new memories?
The Valley is waiting for you! 🌻


NOTE: The new DLC content is designed to unlock after you complete the quests in the base game. If you haven’t yet wrapped up those quests, the new features may not be accessible yet.

The Family Time DLC is all about celebrating what makes the Valley so special – family ties, creativity, and cozy moments.

Dive into fresh stories and build a stronger bond with your farm and family! 

What's New?

  • Grandparents’ House is now open: it’s time for a bigger project after decorating your treehouse. Grandma and grandpa loved what you did to your hideout, and now it’s time to cozy up their place! 

  • New Story Quests: new heartwarming adventures and challenges.

  • New NPCs – Mom and Dad: Your parents have come to the Valley, bringing lots of new farm adventures! 

  • New Animals: Rabbits, birds, insects and new species of ducks.

  • New plants and furniture: 10 new plant types (trees, vegetables, flowers, shrubs), and over 20 pieces of new furniture pieces to decorate with! 

  • New Mini-Games: five new activities to participate in! 

  • Planting Update: You can now place plants outside garden beds for decorative touches.

Ready to spend quality time with family and make new memories?
The Valley is waiting for you! 🌻


NOTE: The new DLC content is designed to unlock after you complete the quests in the base game. If you haven’t yet wrapped up those quests, the new features may not be accessible yet.
